changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO CATEGORY (ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION) VALUES (NEXTVAL('CATEGORY_SEQ'), 'Electronics', 'Consumer electronic products'), (NEXTVAL('CATEGORY_SEQ'), 'Clothing', 'Apparel and accessories'), (NEXTVAL('CATEGORY_SEQ'), 'Books', 'Literature and publications'), (NEXTVAL('CATEGORY_SEQ'), 'Home and Garden', 'Household items and outdoor supplies'), (NEXTVAL('CATEGORY_SEQ'), 'Sports and Outdoors', 'Athletic equipment and outdoor gear'), (NEXTVAL('CATEGORY_SEQ'), 'Toys and Games', 'Children''s toys and games'), (NEXTVAL('CATEGORY_SEQ'), 'Automotive', 'Vehicle parts and accessories'), (NEXTVAL('CATEGORY_SEQ'), 'Furniture', 'Home furnishings and decor'), (NEXTVAL('CATEGORY_SEQ'), 'Office Supplies', 'Stationery and office products'), (NEXTVAL('CATEGORY_SEQ'), 'Grocery', 'Food and beverage items')
